title: Problem loading into games
body: Ok seriously, I have had this problem for a about a week now, every time I'm loading into a game there's a chance that my computer freezes when it hits 60%, i'm really getting sick of it, i'm having to actually restart my computer manually in order to fix it. This is the 4th time this week and have gotten 3 leaver busters for it and lost 2 promos because of it, is it a problem with my computer or is anyone else having these problems as well, it's really frustrating having to deal with this issue please help.

replies.body:
You could try some of the steps listed in this article here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes

Past that I'd recommend submitting a ticket to player support and they should be able to help you out: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
